page.body:
Shayna Mendel
Logistics and Warehouse

Shayna knows about logistics and warehousing and her experience at Walmart gave her invaluable skills that help in the storage and distribution of the variety of strange and exotic meats and foods that Chef's Table supplies.

Shayna is very protective of her warehouse and prides herself on handling things meticulously. She has a natural ability to look toward the future and use her experience as a springboard for change.
